title: Byzantine Empire and Constantinople

vocab.definition: The eastern part of the Roman Empire that continued after Rome fell
The capital city of the Byzantine Empire
The form of Christianity practiced in the Byzantine Empire
The ruler of the Byzantine Empire

teachingNotes: Explain how the Byzantine Empire preserved Roman traditions. Discuss Constantinople's strategic location between Europe and Asia.
